ack.p: This paper is the product of a Stanford University Introductory Seminar: BIO 2N Ecology and Evolution of Infectious Disease in a Changing World. We thank the Stanford University Introductory Seminars program for support. Felix Hol, Haripriya Mukundarajan, and members of the Mordecai, Fukami, and Peay labs provided thoughtful comments on earlier versions of this manuscript.
